channel.title: Npc's again
channel.description: Okay ive added some new npcs for barrows minigame and well whenever i try to use a shop (trade npc) it loggs the person out.heres what shows up on my runserver.bat please help me fix, i dont want to take off my npc's because people really want the barrows. Also i am using p16 blitzscape pk. [code]---BlitzScape by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -79 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15072) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14389) at client.process(client.java:14359) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:51) Project16 [fatal] - exception test's file has been saved! ClientHandler: Client test disconnected. [/code]

item.title: Npc's again
item.dc:creator: @mr_monkey mr monkey
item.description:
@mr_monkey wrote:

no i did, before i added the new barrows npc’s the shops were all working

Its Probaliy Because You Didnt Connect the Shop to the NPC In your Client.java
